name: NO WAY OUT - FUNDRAISING - DEMO
description:
We are a Indie Game Development Studio based in India and right now working on a Game Name "NO WAY OUT" This is our first project and we are committed to finish this game and serve it to all the Players around the World.

NO WAY OUT

IT IS A HARDCORE SURVIVAL PvP MULTIPLAYER GAME, The Game will take place in different Maps and Locations but right Now we have only one Map But after getting some funds we can add the new maps in the Game.
                          The Game is still in the development right now and it will also going to take One(1) more Year For to Launch. This game will be going to made fully in India and we need some worker for the Animation, Modeling and Music that's why we started our Campaign Here to raise some funds and finish this game as soon as possible.

JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER

OR

DONATE US HERE

  1. First 500 Backers will get a free Copy.
  2. Backers who Donate 1000 ₹ (15 $) or Above Gets Free Copy and Early-Access.
  3. Backers who Donate above 2500 ₹ (35 $) will Get 1, 2 and Merchandise.
  4. Backers who Donate above 5000 ₹  (70$) will Get 1, 2, 3 and In Game Exclusive Item.
